title: Currency Transaction Reports (CTRs) - customer copies
dataVerified: Customer name, transaction amount, date, financial institution
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Customer receives verifiable copy of CTR filing. Domain binding verifies financial institution. Tamper-evident transaction record. IRS BSA compliance. Prevents disputes over reported amounts.
